data.title: Regular Tuesday Night Trivia patrons!
data.text:
Went for Tuesday Trivia Night.  Nikki is great!  Hamburgers were $2.00 on Tuesdays.  Very fun place.
Only drawback is they keep the music a little loud when Trivia is on so it makes it difficult to hear.

data.title: Great place to watch the game
data.text: I go to Holsteins to watch the football games on Sunday's , lots of new tv's , good specials , and great buffet fforff for for

data.title: Need to ID your patrons...
data.text: Fun but if you're over 20 years old - you're TOO OLD for this crowd.  Half the customers look underage. Can't believe this place hasn't been busted numerous times.

data.title: Needs a New Image
data.text: This place could have great potential being located in a suburban downtown area but doesn't seem like it wants to. Tired and antiquated interior with subpar food and only one bartender. Really? One bartender at 5:00 on a Thursday? This place should try and remodel the interior and give the exterior a facelift.

data.title: This is a kiddie-bar
data.text: We went to this bar a few times.  The young waitresses are more interested in flirting with the young guys sitting at the bar than to take care of an older couple.  We had such waitress once.  We sat down at a high-top table and my husband put down a $20 bill.  A waitress finally came to our table and we ordered a pizza.  She took the $20 bill and left.  Neither one of us noticed that she had taken it, so when the pizza arrived, and she told us the price in order to collect, we both thought that the other took the money off the table.  I then gave her another $20 bill.  Much later we realized that that we had paid twice for the pizza.  The entire time the waitress did not return to our table, she was much too busy flirting with a group of guys at the bar.  My husband had to get up and get us another beer at the bar himself.  Since we had already given a $20 tip for inferior service, we left without leaving an additional tip.  We never again went there.  We now go to a bar called Cuzin's that is further South on Oak Park Avenue.  We go there about 3 times a week.  We love the food and service.

data.title: Free pizza on Friday nights as long as your buying drinks.
data.text:
Decent selection of beers, decent food. Generally rather a loud younger crowd.
 Bands play on weekends. A patio for smokers.

data.title: Great food and beer
data.text: We went to dinner before a concert.  This bar has many craft beers on tap and the food was very good.  Be sure to look at the daily specials as we got a free 3 topping large pizza by simply ordering a drink each on a Friday.  The pizza was very good and the burgers looked fantastic.  We did not receive very good service, but the beer and food more than made up for it.

data.title: Don't let Sara try an trick you!!!
data.text: My very first experience at this bar was BEYOND horrible!!! I will never step foot in that place ever again. At first i was reluctant after reading all the bad reviews on this place..but i went anyways. As i arrive with two of my friends we sat an wait 10min. Before flag down a waitress after she repeatedly ignore our table.  After ordering (sara) our waitress tells us our total is $16 and before getting our food n drinks we had to pay wich i found very unorthodox but paid. Sara never produced a bill for us.  When i asked can i see a copy of the bill she lied and said she can't she closed out the check. I have served fr 5+ years and i know for a fact she was lieing. Sara gave us our food never came back to check on us or anything. It wasn't that crowded i dont know why she wasn't very attentive at all. Before leaving i asked the bartender for a copy of our bill after waiting 5 min. Finnaly got our bill and of course was over charged because sara made up a price in her head and tried to be slick! The bartender refunded me our money and we left. Nevertheless i will NEVER return to this establishment. I only gave one star because dispite our horrible service and or con of a waitress sara the wings were good.

data.title: Great place for great times!
data.text: I have been going to Holsteins for years now, it's always been a fun place to hang out. It gets pretty packed on Thursday nights, due to the specials that go on. I went there this last Thursday, and was very pleased to get 3 tables for my large group that made time to come in for my friends birthday. We were very well taken care of the entire night by Alicia the bartender. She really pays attention to everyone at the bar and does a great job multitasking. Our waitress did a great job as well, I did not get her name. She was a blonde and fairly new.. I will continue to return to Holsteins!!
